issue.title: [CMake] Thrift version not respected in CMake configuration version.txt
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-7339](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-7339). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
If thrift is requested via BUNBLED, thrift 0.9.1 will be downloaded instead of the requested version. This is due to FindThrift.cmake overriding THRIFT_VERSION from the locally installed thrift compiler (0.9.1. on ubuntu 18.04).
